entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
